</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="Delta32">

</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="Delta32FromGOT">
A 32-bit GOT delta
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4aa8133be772984451fd00483f26395c24" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RequestGOTAndTransformToDelta32FromGOT">
A GOT entry offset within GOT getter/constructor, transformed to Delta32FromGOT pointing at the GOT entry for the original target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4ab909c856e2b968674b459c652db52d21" />
<EnumerationListItem name="BranchPCRel32">

</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStub">
A 32-bit PC-relative branch to a pointer jump stub
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4a032d3ec55a73bf3dd3dde3c7c15cd1d8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStubBypassable">
A relaxable version of BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStub
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

### createAnonymousPointer() {#ac007f2f0fe33b64e019817ec931a4b79}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Symbol &amp; llvm::jitlink::i386::createAnonymousPointer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; PointerSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &#42; InitialTarget=nullptr, uint64&#95;t InitialAddend=0)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Creates a new pointer block in the given section and returns an anonymous symbol pointing to it.

If InitialTarget is given then an Pointer32 relocation will be added to the block pointing at InitialTarget.

The pointer block will have the following default values: alignment: 32-bit alignment-offset: 0 address: highest allowable (~7U)

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/i386-h/#l00283">283</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/i386-h">i386.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createAnonymousPointerJumpStub() {#a32b1c39140fb137040c2fa749b1aa300}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Symbol &amp; llvm::jitlink::i386::createAnonymousPointerJumpStub (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; StubSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &amp; PointerSymbol)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a jump stub that jumps via the pointer at the given symbol and an anonymous symbol pointing to it.

Return the anonymous symbol.

The stub block will be created by createPointerJumpStubBlock.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/i386-h/#l00315">315</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/i386-h">i386.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createPointerJumpStubBlock() {#a10c6b85409593a97182da9d8018eb8b2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Block &amp; llvm::jitlink::i386::createPointerJumpStubBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; StubSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &amp; PointerSymbol)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a jump stub block that jumps via the pointer at the given symbol.

The stub block will have the following default values: alignment: 8-bit alignment-offset: 0 address: highest allowable: (~5U)

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/i386-h/#l00299">299</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/i386-h">i386.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/i386-cpp/#l00019">19</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/i386-cpp">i386.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### optimizeGOTAndStubAccesses() {#a877b3d728be6b7084aef27f92242f8bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::jitlink::i386::optimizeGOTAndStubAccesses (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G)</>}>
Optimize the GOT and Stub relocations if the edge target address is in range.

<ul>
<li>PCRel32GOTLoadRelaxable. For this edge kind, if the target is in range, then replace GOT load with lea. (THIS IS UNIMPLEMENTED RIGHT NOW!)</li>
<li>BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStubRelaxable. For this edge kind, if the target is in range, replace a indirect jump by plt stub with a direct jump to the target</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/i386-cpp/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/i386-cpp">i386.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
